org.modelio.api.modelio.audit

Interface IAuditService


  • public interface IAuditService
    Audit services.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void audit(MObject element)
      Post 'element' in the asynchronous audit queue.
      boolean check(ITransaction transaction)
      Launch the core checker on all elements created and modified in a transaction.
      boolean check(MObject element)
      Launch the core protection checker on 'element' and its composition graph.

    • Method Detail

      • check

        boolean check(MObject element)
        Launch the core protection checker on 'element' and its composition graph.

        A true return code means the model object or one of its children is in inconsistent state. In this case committing immediately an open transaction will fail with IllegalModelManipulationException. If no transaction is running, the model is broken and should either be repaired or deleted.

        Parameters:
        element - The element to audit.
        Returns:
        true if the check does detect blocking error and false otherwise.

      • audit

        void audit(MObject element)
        Post 'element' in the asynchronous audit queue.

        The MObject will be audited asynchronously by the Audit system and results posted in the audit results view.

        Parameters:
        element - The element to audit

      • check

        boolean check(ITransaction transaction)
        Launch the core checker on all elements created and modified in a transaction.
        Parameters:
        element - The transaction to audit.
        Returns:
        true if the check does detect blocking error and false otherwise.
